name: Olivia
text: Here is my cool friend, Pat.

name: Olivia
text:
He loves to relax with a cold soda in 
a paper bag next to a kiddie pool.

name: Olivia
text:
Use the A, W, S, D keys to move around 
the map.

name: Olivia
text:
Move with caution. Small biters will come 
from the edges to ruin your day.

name: Olivia
text:
Let me know when you are ready to move on 
to the next tutorial.
